content:
Nassim Haramein has written several books on his ideas and theories, these include:

* "The Structure of Atomic Nuclei" (co-authored with Elizabeth Rauscher)
* "The Connected Universe"
* "The Schwarzschild Proton"
* "The Elegant Universe: From the Illusion of Separation to Unification"
* "The Black Whole Revolution"

Please note that these books are not widely accepted or supported by the scientific community and are considered to be outside the mainstream of physics research. It is always important to approach any scientific theory or idea with a critical and open-minded attitude, looking for evidence to either support or disprove it and consult with the scientific community and peer-reviewed journals for
